skills.name: Web Services

skills.name: Business Process Analysis & Modelling
skills.description: Interpret and understand the requirements of the company's customer base to develop appropriate business requirements and technical specifications.

skills.name: Delivering To Defined Timelines
skills.description: Working with developers and testers and work within project timelines and budgets to meet business requirements.

skills.name: Project Management Frameworks
skills.description: Agile to Scrum to Waterfall to Kanban etc.

skills.name: Work Estimation & Planning
skills.description: Estimate the resources, budget, time and risks and then formulate a project plan and schedule.

skills.name: Company Standards & Guidelines
skills.description: To develop software according to published standards and guidelines, including code standards and user interface design guidelines.

skills.name: Understanding Of Change Management
skills.description: Ensure that changes are recorded and then evaluated, authorized, prioritized, planned, tested, implemented, documented and reviewed by participating and provide input on go/no-go decisions for product releases.

skills.name: Technical Writing
skills.description: Write documentation for projects, including requirements, the architecture/design document, code documentation, test plans and test cases, and end-user documentation.

skills.name: Testing, Fault Location & Rootcause Analysis
skills.description: Supporting and resolving product issues alongside test and quality assurance teams.

skills.name: Maintaining & Improving Existing Applications
skills.description: Maintain an excellent level of understanding and knowledge of company's products, processes and services to research, test, and coordinates the conversion and/or integration of new features based on client requirements.

skills.name: Code & Architecture Reviews
skills.description: Reviews software architectural decisions with respect to their impact on performance as well as other quality attributes, such as reliability or modifiability and examine source code to find mistakes, thereby improving overall code quality.

skills.name: Mentor & Coaching
skills.description: Provide technical guidance and educate team members and coworkers on policies, practices and process to collaboratively & efficiently.

skills.name: Software Development Trends
skills.description: Maintaining a strong understanding of software development trends and technology.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.description: Able to multitask, prioritize, and manage time efficiently.

skills.name: Communications & Negotiation Skills
skills.description: Communicate clearly to both technical and business people at all levels.

skills.name: Innovation
skills.description: The ability to come up with new ideas and techniques.

skills.name: Source Control
skills.description: Working with multiple source controls: Git, CVS, VSS, SVN etc.

skills.name: Automation and Task Runners
skills.description: Workflow management tools: Grunt, Gulp, Webpack etc.

skills.name: General Applications
